because yours is the kingdom of God.
“‘And this is the regulation of the fellowship offerings that he must present to Yahweh:
“Speak to the Israelites, saying, ‘You must not eat any fat of ox, or sheep, or goat;

‘This people honors me with their lips,
but their heart is far, far away from me.
“‘Then the priest will bring her near and present her before Yahweh;
“‘All the days of keeping himself separated for Yahweh he will not go to a person who is dead;
“Speak to Aaron and his sons, saying, ‘You will bless the Israelites: You will say to them:

“But woe to you who are rich,
because you have received your comfort.

when they have nothing to do with you
and say bad things about you,
and when they treat your name as something evil.
They do all this because you are followers of the Son of Man.

and build up again the tent of David that has fallen,
and the parts of it that had been torn down I will build up again
and will restore it,

even all the Gentiles who are called by my name,
says the Lord, who makes these things
“But to you who are listening I say: Love your enemies, do good to those who hate you,
“Everyone who comes to me and listens to my words and does them—I will show you what he is like:

“He himself took away our sicknesses,
and carried away our diseases.”

“Blessed be Abram by God Most High,
Maker of heaven and earth.
“Speak to the Israelites and say to them, ‘When you cross the Jordan into the land of Canaan,
“‘You will mark out your eastern boundary from Hazar Enan to Shepham;

‘Behold, I am sending my messenger before your face,
who will prepare your way before you.’

‘We played the flute for you and you did not dance;
we sang a lament and you did not weep.’
“Speak to the Israelites and say to them, ‘When you cross the Jordan into the land of Canaan,

“Behold, you are pregnant
and shall have a son.
And you shall call his name Ishmael,
for Yahweh has listened to your suffering.

his hand will be against everyone,
and the hand of everyone will be against him,
and he will live in hostility with all his brothers.”

and let there be no one to live in it,’
and,

and signs on the earth below,

and my tongue rejoiced greatly,

“I will open my mouth in parables;
I will proclaim what has been hidden since the creation.”

“Please hear my words:
If there is a prophet among you, I, Yahweh,
will make myself known to him in a vision.
I will speak to him in a dream.
“When an infectious skin disease is on a person and he is brought to the priest,

“And I pleaded with Yahweh at that time, saying,
“And when a man or a woman has an infection on the head or in the beard,
“And when a man or a woman has spots on their body’s skin, white spots,

Through you Israel shall pronounce blessing, saying,
‘May God make you like Ephraim and like Manasseh.’”
So he put Ephraim before Manasseh.

and great of loyal love,

but surely he leaves nothing unpunished,
visiting the sin of the fathers on the sons

‘The stone which the builders rejected,

“I am the good shepherd, and I know my own, and my own know me,

their rock is not like our Rock,
and our enemies recognize this.

and my hand takes hold of it in judgment,

and my haters I will repay.

and my sword shall devour flesh with the blood of the slain,
and captives from the heads of the leaders of the enemy.’

“He was led like a sheep to the slaughter,

“Hear, O Yahweh, the voice of Judah,

his own hands strive for him,

“Your Thummim and your Urim
are for your faithful one,

you contended with him
at the waters of Meribah.

‘I have not regarded them,’
and his brothers he did not acknowledge,
and his children he did not know,
but rather they observed your word,
and your covenant they kept.

“The beloved of Yahweh dwells securely,
the Most High shields all around him,
all the day,

between you and between the woman,
